body: Fill Your Bottle with Rain Water        There are Two Filtered Rain Water Stations in the Park. One at Kīlauea Visitor Center and One at Jaggar Museum         Captured from clouds Filtered by sand Pumped here by solar  Forgot your bottle? Stainless steel water bottles are available at Kīlauea Visitor Center and Jaggar Museum Your purchase helps protect Hawaiʻi's native plants and animals STEP AWAY FROM THE PLASTIC Remember, you are what you drink
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Fill Your Bottle with Rain Water
